title: error code 9s
body:
i cant play any gamemode when i click on play, the red triangle thing with an exclamation mark in the middle appears next to blind pick and etc
rito plz

replies.body: I'm experiencing the same problem, after 1 game of ARAM and 2 games of TFT every game option has an exclamation mark (Draft pick, Blind pick, ARAM, etc...). For some reason some of the other options have literally disappeared into nothing.
